content: in brackets to last 13 stitches* k1 ssk k2 yo k1 yo k2 k2tog k3 yo* k1 center stitch repeat between * to last two stitches k2 finishing loosely bind off all stitches as follows k1 *k1 transfer 2 stitches back to left hand needle k2 decrease through back loops repeat from * to end weave in all ends and block aggressively chart directions  complete caston as directed in written instructions  complete setup row from chart 1  complete chart 1 row 1 -22 twice  repeat chart 1 row 1-12  complete chart 2 once  bindoff and finish as directed in written instructions © 2009 christy verity v 3 chart 1 beginning and body of scarf stitch counts center stitch repeat edge stitches by repeat/row 3 2 1 115 71 o o o - - o o - - o o o 21 111 67 o o t o - - o t o - - o t o o 19 107 63 o o - - o o - - o o 17 103 59 o o - - o o - - o o 15 99 55 o o - - o o - - o o 13 139 95 51 o - - o o - - o 11 135 91 47 o - - o o - - o 9 131 87 43 o - - o t o - - o 7 127 83 39 o - - o o - - o 5 123 79 35 o - - o o - - o 3 119 75 31 o - o o - o 1 setup row 3 27 o o o o 3 setup row 1 23 o o o o 1 symbol key k2 decrease ssk o yo notes - p - knit odd row as charted t sl 2 as if to k2 decrease k1 psso - all even row knit the edge stitches as the beginning and end of the row knit the remaining stitches as presented or knit the knits and purl the purls k - knit row 1 - 22 twice then row 1 - 12 to complete body section © 2009 christy verity chart 2 lace border © 2009 christy verity
